publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4345 Des McNulty: Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers—That the Parliament expresses grave concern at the House of Lords ruling on 3 May 2006 which means that compensation for mesothelioma sufferers will be cut and supports Lord Rodger’s judgement that, no matter where an individual contracted the disease, they should receive a full payment, reflecting practice in the Scottish courts. Supported by: Pauline McNeill*, Fiona Hyslop*, Murray Tosh*, Christine May*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Trish Godman*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Rosie Kane*, Janis Hughes*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Stewart Stevenson*, John Home Robertson*, Kate Maclean*, Bill Butler*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Shona Robison*, Helen Eadie*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-4345 Des McNulty: Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers—That the Parliament expresses grave concern at the House of Lords ruling on 3 May 2006 which means that compensation for mesothelioma sufferers will be cut and supports Lord Rodger’s judgement that, no matter where an individual contracted the disease, they should receive a full payment, reflecting practice in the Scottish courts. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Fiona Hyslop, Murray Tosh, Christine May, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Brian Adam, Jackie Baillie, Mr Andrew Welsh, Trish Godman, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Frank McAveety, Rosie Kane, Janis Hughes, Mr Duncan McNeil, Mr Charlie Gordon, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Stewart Stevenson, John Home Robertson, Kate Maclean, Bill Butler, Marilyn Livingstone, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing, Mr Jim Wallace, Shona Robison, Helen Eadie, Eleanor Scott, Mr Jamie Stone, Marlyn Glen, Robin Harper*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Cathie Craigie*, Linda Fabiani*, Dr Jean Turner*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Richard Baker*, Paul Martin*, Christine Grahame*, Sarah Boyack*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Maureen Macmillan*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Karen Whitefield*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Scott Barrie*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Alasdair Morgan*
S2M-4345 Justice for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 4 May 2006) Cathy Peattie*
